welcome:
Welcome to BDO botNET setup. In order to use BDO botNET, I will need some basic information about your guild and server. For detailed instructions and prerequisite setup please refer to: `[insert github link]`.
Have you followed the prerequisite setup and are you ready to continue? [y/n]

attendanceType:
Please select how you would like node war attendance to be taken:
```yaml
[1] Voice Comms
 #  Active members in the specified voice comm channels will be counted for attendance.
[2] Signup
 #  Members will react to the node war announcement message in order to signup.```

Please make a selection from the options below:
```yaml
[1] Voice Comms
 #  Active members in the specified voice comm channels will be counted for attendance.
[2] Signup
 #  Members will react to the node war announcement message in order to signup.```
voiceChannels:

payoutWeight:
Please select how you would like to weight payouts:
```yaml
[1] Balanced
 #  Both NW and SMH will be used for payouts.
[2] Node Wars only
 #  Only node war participation will be used for payouts
[3] Sea Monsters only
 #  Only Sea Monster contributions will be used for payouts```
error: Setup process has been aborted due to time out or error.
This discord has already started or has completed the BDO botNET setup process. If you would like to change your configuration and options, use the `!options` command.
optionsMain:
```yaml
[1] Guild Logs
 #  View / Update node war results and sea monster hauls for the guild
[2] Audit
 #  View / Remove node war attendance or sea monster hauls for specific members
[3] Payout
 #  Generate a payout list
[4] Send Reminders
 #  Remind guild members to verify their family names and to update their stats
[5] Setup
 #  Change guild name, roles, channels, and attendance / payout type

[0] Cancel
 #  Exit without making changes```
optionsGuildLog:
```yaml
[1] Node Wars
 #  View and edit Node War results
[2] Sea Monsters
 #  View Sea Monster hauls

[0] Cancel
 #  Exit without making changes```
Please select a Family Name or Discord @
optionsAudit: Please enter a Family Name or Discord @:

```yaml
 #  Family Name: {FAMILYNAME}
[1] Node Wars
 #  View / remove recent node war records
[2] Sea Monsters
 #  View / remove recent sea monster hauls

[0] Cancel
 #  Exit without making changes```
optionsSetup:
```yaml
[1] Guild Name
 #  Name of your guild
[2] Discord Roles
 #  Recognized discord roles (GM/Officer/Member/Verified)
[3] Discord Channels
 #  Channels for announcements and commands
[4] Attendance Type
 #  Voice comm attendance or Signup attendance
[5] Payout Weight
 #  Payouts weighted towards node wars, sea monsters, or an even split

[0] Cancel
 #  Exit without making changes```
optionsRoles:
```yaml
[1] Guild Master
 #  Able to edit bot settings
[2] Officer
 #  Able to update node war information and take attendance
[3] Member
 #  Able to use general commands
[4] Verified
 #  Have verified their family name

[0] Cancel
 #  Exit without making changes```
optionsChannels:
```yaml
[1] Announcements
 #  The channel node war updates will be posted to
[2] Commands
 #  The channel bot commands can be used in

[0] Cancel
 #  Exit without making changes```

permission: You do not have permission to use this command

verify: The family name `{NAME}` has been added to the database
Your family name has been updated to `{NAME}`

Please provide your **family name**.
Example: `!verify Dinkusa`
stats: Please !verify your family name before attempting to update information.

A class name is required.
Example: `!stats Valk 253 256 304`

Please provide your **class**, **AP**, **AAP**, and **DP**.
Example: `!stats Valk 253 256 304`
seaLoot: Recording a haul of `{AMOUNT}` by `{NAME}`. Please upload an image of your haul to confirm:

Please use this command to self-report sea monster hauls.

Image not recognized, report canceled. Upload your image directly to discord or post a direct link to an image.

marketWatch:
```yaml
    Market Watch‚Ñ¢
[1] Price Threshold
 #  Set an alert for an item raising above or falling below a threshold
[2] Price Change
 #  Be alerted when the average price of an item changes
[3] Listed Price
 #  Be alerted when an item is listed below a threshold
[4] Flood Alert
 #  Set an alert when total listings raise above or fall below a threshold
[5] Sold Count
 #  Be alerted when a set amount of items have sold

[0] Exit
 #  Cancel without setting an alert
```

```yaml
    Please select the threshold mode
[1] Above
 #  Be alerted when price or item count rises above your threshold
[2] Below
 #  Be alerted when price or item count falls below your threshold

[0] Exit
 #  Cancel without setting an alert
```
Error. You have exceeded the maximum amount of watched items. Use the `!list` command to remove items.
marketWatchList: You do not currently have any items watched. Use `!search` to mark items to watch.
Successfully removed item from Watch List.
help:
```yaml
    H E L P!!
!options
  # GM Only
  # Provides a list of options to view logs, generate payout lists, and update managment settings
!node
  # Officer Only
  # Provides a list of options to set node war locations, update enemy counts, and report the result of node wars
!verify
  # Updates your family name
!stats
  # Updates your class (optional) and AP/AAP/DP
!loot
  # Self-reports profits from a sea monster haul
!check
  # Check the stats of a guild member
!search
  # Searches the market for an item
  # Can be used to set various market alerts, check market prices, and check enchant rates / profits
!list
  # View / Edit your current market watch list
```
